title: Indian Super League
desc: The league is committed to investing in stadium refurbishment in the ten identified venues and also to a strong grassroots development program that will create a platform to groom football talent in the country.

title: The AIFF
desc: The Official handle of the All India Football Federation and the Indian Football Team. They accelerate the growth of Indian and Asian football, with transformational legacy initiatives fast-tracking the development of the game,

title: World Cricket
desc: Cricbuzz provides blazing fast live cricket scores and cricket news from around the world. Catch up with everything that happens on a cricket field, as it happens. Live cricbuzz blogs with satire thrown in for good measure.

title: World Kabaddi
desc: World Kabaddi was formed on 24th March 2018 and currently has more than 52 members and is rapidly growing on all 5 continents. Kabaddi originated in India some 5,000 years ago. It is one of the select traditional sports that has grown into a mainstream sport. The organization hopes to double its membership by 2020 with special attention to promoting the game outside the Asian region

title: Volleyballmag.com
desc: VBM is the active sport's magazine of choice, covering all aspects of volleyball and accompanying lifestyle. An outstanding resource for the community, VBM serves all who are passionate about volleyball
